 - The following explain the function of each role.

data.day_discussion_protocol_rule: Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
data.day_voting_protocol_rule: Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
data.night_werewolf_discussion_protocol_rule: Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.

new_player_event_views.description:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

data.rule_of_role: Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.

new_player_event_views.description:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

new_visible_announcements:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

new_visible_announcements:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

new_player_event_views.description:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

data.day_discussion_protocol_rule: Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
data.day_voting_protocol_rule: Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
data.night_werewolf_discussion_protocol_rule: Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.

new_player_event_views.description:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

data.rule_of_role: Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.

new_player_event_views.description:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

data.day_discussion_protocol_rule: Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
data.day_voting_protocol_rule: Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.

new_player_event_views.description:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

new_player_event_views.description:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

data.rule_of_role: Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.

new_player_event_views.description:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

new_player_event_views.description:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

new_player_event_views.description:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

data.rule_of_role: Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.

new_player_event_views.description:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

data.rule_of_role: Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.

new_player_event_views.description:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

new_player_event_views.description:
Werewolf game begins.
 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

 - **Player Roster:** ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Charlie', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey']
 - **Alive Players:** 8.
 - **Role Counts:** {Villager: 4, Werewolf: 2, Doctor: 1, Seer: 1}.
 - **Alive Team Member:** {Villagers: 6, Werewolves: 2}
 - **Day Discussion:** Roundrobin. Players speak in round-robin order for 2 round(s).
 - **Day Exile Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - **Night Werewolf Vote:** Sequential Voting. Players vote one by one. Player with the most votes after all have voted is exiled. Ties are broken randomly.
 - The following explain the function of each role.
  * Role name Villager - team Villagers - No special abilities. Participates in the daily vote to eliminate a suspected werewolf.
  * Role name Werewolf - team Werewolves - Each night, collaborates with fellow werewolves to vote on eliminating one player.
  * Role name Doctor - team Villagers - Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
  * Role name Seer - team Villagers - Each night, may inspect one player to learn their true role.
 - If a player is exiled in the day, their role will be revealed.
 - If a player is eliminated at night, their role will be revealed.

Your player id is "Charlie". Your team is "Villagers". Your role is "Doctor".
The rule of your role: Each night, may protect one player from a werewolf attack. Doctor is NOT allowed to save themselves during night time. Doctor is NOT allowed to save the same player on consecutive nights.
Night 0 begins!
Wake up Doctor. Who would you like to save? The options are ['Kai', 'Jordan', 'Taylor', 'Alex', 'Jamie', 'Quinn', 'Casey'].
